snippet.title: Elsie - Overview Trailer | The MIX Showcase March 2023
snippet.description:
Get a deep dive into Elsie, including a peek at the colorful biomes, various weapons, and enemies, and meet some of the bosses you'll encounter in this upcoming Neo retro roguelike game featuring classic run and gun gameplay, tightly tuned into a bullet hell ballet. Dash, dive, and shoot across gorgeous neon-drenched pixel art stages.

Elsie will be available on Steam and Nintendo Switch.
